summary: For those who play as a dragonman instead of a werewolf!
descriptionHtml:
Threw this together for those people who are using either Dragon Form Standalone http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=27569495 or Were-Dovah http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15976 . Well, I made it for those who want their dragon to sound less like a wolf :)

Replaces the following sounds:
Howl upon transformation
Shout
Death cries
Footsteps (except when sprinting)
Jump landing

As of version 2.0 it also replaces:
Attack/clawing sounds
Idle breathing
Feeding
Feeding kills
Mauling
And adds a new shout.

New in 2.2:
Added a transformation sound
Replaced some attack sounds
Removed the growl after you feed
(I don't feel like spamming this mod page with new videos after I've made a small update. I recommend just downloading this file, extract the sounds and preview them in Windows Media Player or something.)


Recommended mods:
Unique Player Werewolves http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27430

Incompatible with other mods that replaces the werewolf npc sounds, such as Heart of the Beast.

Known issues:
Affects all werewolves. I don't know how to make the sounds standalone for the player.

It would be nice if someone could make a transition effect that is based on the dragonman model from Skyrim Monster Mod.

Future plans:
I plan to add a more bone-crackling effect to the transformation.

Tools used:
Fallout Mod Manager
Adobe Audition 1.5

Credits:
Sounddogs.com for the soundclip I used as a part of the tf sound.
author: T3alrose
